item.title: Phone call to the FBI Victim Services
item.description: On February 15, 2023, I tried to call a phone number I found on an FBI brochure related to the FBI Victim Services. The phone number was (202)-324-3000. But the FBI operator hanged up on me. After the FBI informed me the FBI was recording the phone call, I informed the operator that I was also recording the phone call and he disagreed so he hanged up. To gain a clearer understanding of the sequence of events in this case, I invite you to view a detailed timeline at the following link:
